name: PublishADFTask
description: Deploys entire ADF (v2) from JSON files to ADF instance
author: SQLPlayer

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure subscription to target for deployment.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the Resource Group.

inputs.name: DataFactoryName
inputs.label: Target Azure Data Factory Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the target Azure Data Factory

inputs.name: DataFactoryCodePath
inputs.label: Azure Data Factory Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path from the repo root to the ADF folder which should contains sub-folders like 'pipeline', 'dataset', etc.

inputs.name: Location
inputs.label: Target Region
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Azure Region of target Data Factory.
It is used only in order to create new instance of ADF.

inputs.name: StageCode
inputs.label: Environment (stage)
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Allows pointing configuration with values for all properties who need to be replaced.
If parameter is specified, a CSV file named './deployment/config-{stage}.csv' must exists in repo.

inputs.name: StageConfigFile
inputs.label: Environment (stage) Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Allows pointing configuration with values for all properties who need to be replaced.
If specified, CSV config file name must ends with '.csv'

inputs.name: DeleteNotInSource
inputs.label: Delete objects not in source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the deployment process should removing objects not existing in the source (code).

inputs.name: StopStartTriggers
inputs.label: Stop/Start triggers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether or not to stop the triggers before beginning deployment and start them afterwards.

inputs.name: CreateNewInstance
inputs.label: Create new ADF instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether or not to create a new ADF if target instance doesn't exist yet.

inputs.name: FilteringType
inputs.label: Filtering Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of filtering ADF objects: File Path or Inline Text Field

inputs.name: FilterText
inputs.label: Include/Exclude Filtering Text
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Multi-line or comma-separated list of objects to be included or excluded in the deployment.
Can be specify by exact name of wildcard. Example:
+pipeline.PL_Copy*
+dataset.ds_srcCopy
dataset.*
-pipeline.PL_DoNotPublish*
integrationruntime.*

inputs.name: FilterTextFile
inputs.label: Include/Exclude Filtering File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Multi-line or comma-separated list of objects to be included/excluded in/from the deployment.
Can be specify by exact name of wildcard. Example:
+pipeline.PL_Copy*
+dataset.ds_srcCopy
dataset.*
-pipeline.PL_DoNotPublish*
integrationruntime.*
